description: 4th term in Euclid-Mullin prime sequence started with n-th prime (cf. A000945).
comments: First term in Euclid-Mullin sequence is p (say), 2nd term (if p odd) is 2, 3rd term is A023592.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := (Clear[f]; f[1] = Prime[n]; f[k_] := f[k] = FactorInteger[Product[f[i], {i, 1, k-1}]+1][[1, 1]]; f[4]); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 76}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 05 2014 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_
